name: Kang (The Conqueror)
text:
Toughness
When Defeated: Advance the main scheme to stage 2 at the end of the phase.
real_text:
Toughness
When Defeated: Advance the main scheme to stage 2 at the end of the phase.
attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Kang attacks you, either place 1 threat on the main scheme, or he gets +2 ATK for this attack.

name: Kang (Immortus)
text:
Toughness.
This villain cannot take damage while a minion is in play.
When Defeated: Remove the Chronopolis from the game. At the end of the phase, join another game area.
real_text:
Toughness.
This villain cannot take damage while a minion is in play.
When Defeated: Remove the Chronopolis from the game. At the end of the phase, join another game area.

real_text:
Toughness.

name: Kang's Arrival
text:
When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card.
If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
real_text:
When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card.
If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
flavor: Kang believes that by defeating Earth's mightiest heroes, the rest of the planet will submit to his rule.
back_text:
Contents: Kang (I), each Kang (II), and Kang (III). Kang and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Temporal).
Setup: Set each Kang (II), Kang (III), and Kang's Dominion side scheme aside. remove each player's obligation cards from the game. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: The Master of Time
text:
Forced Interrupt: When an acceleration token would be placed on another scheme, place it here instead.
Players cannot join this game area unless there are no other game areas remaining. When all the players have joined this game area, advanced to stage 4A.
real_text:
Forced Interrupt: When an acceleration token would be placed on another scheme, place it here instead.
Players cannot join this game area unless there are no other game areas remaining. When all the players have joined this game area, advanced to stage 4A.
back_text: When Revealed: Place 1 acceleration token here for each side scheme in play, then discard each side scheme. Each player reveals a random stage 3A in turn oder. Remove any unused stage 3 schemes from the game.
back_flavor: Kang reels back, but saves himself by separating the heroes through time and space.

name: The Chronopolis
text:
Forced Repsonse: After this stage is complete, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Immortus) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area.
If all the players at this stage are defeated, this stage is complete.
real_text:
Forced Repsonse: After this stage is complete, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Immortus) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area.
If all the players at this stage are defeated, this stage is complete.
back_text: When Revealed: Create your own game area and place this scheme in it. Add Kang (Immortus) to the game area and deal yourself an encounter card.

name: Inexorable Fate
text:
Forced Response: After this stage is completed, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Iron Lad) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area.
If all the players at the stage are defeated, this stage is completed.
real_text:
Forced Response: After this stage is completed, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Iron Lad) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area.
If all the players at the stage are defeated, this stage is completed.
back_text: When Revealed: Create your own game area and place this scheme in it. Add Kang (Iron Lad) to the game area and deal yourself an encounter card.

name: The Realm of Rama-Tut
text:
Forced Response: After this stage is completed, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Rama-Tut) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area.
If all the players at this stage are defeated, this stage is completed.
real_text:
Forced Response: After this stage is completed, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Rama-Tut) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area.
If all the players at this stage are defeated, this stage is completed.
back_text: When Revealed: Create your own game area and place this scheme in it. Add Kang (Rama-Tut) to the game area and deal yourself an encounter card.

name: The Present Future War
text:
Forced Resposne: After this stage is completed, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Scarlet Centurion) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area.
If all the players at this stage are defeated, this stage is completed.
real_text:
Forced Resposne: After this stage is completed, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Scarlet Centurion) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area.
If all the players at this stage are defeated, this stage is completed.
back_text: When Revealed: Create your own game area and place this scheme in it. Add Kang (Scarlet Centurion) to the game area and deal yourself an encounter card.

name: Kang's Wrath
text:
When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck, discard pile, and set-aside area for their nemesis minion and puts it into play engaged with them. Shuffle the encounter deck.
If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
real_text:
When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck, discard pile, and set-aside area for their nemesis minion and puts it into play engaged with them. Shuffle the encounter deck.
If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
back_text: When Revealed: Reveal Kang (III) and add him to the game area. Reveal each face down Kang's Dominion under this stage.
back_flavor: You used your enemy's technology to reunite in the present day, just in time to counter Kang's assault on Earth.

name: Temporal Shield
text:
Attach to Kang.
Forced Interrupt: When Kang is attacked, discard Temporal Shield → prevent all damage from this attack and deal 1 damage to the attacker. (Max 1 per attack.)
real_text:
Attach to Kang.
Forced Interrupt: When Kang is attacked, discard Temporal Shield → prevent all damage from this attack and deal 1 damage to the attacker. (Max 1 per attack.)
flavor: "Put away your childish weapons! They are no more than toys to me!" - Kang
illustrator: Frank D Armatta, Karl Kazel, & Jorge Molina

name: Future Weapon
text: Attach to Kang.
real_text: Attach to Kang.
attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Kang attacks, the attack gains overkill. If this attack damages a hero, that hero is stunned. After this attack, discard Future Weapon.
flavor: "Like myself, you know that combat means something, and honor more~" - Kang

name: Frozen in Time
text:
Attach to your identity.
Forced Interrupt: When attached character would ready, discard this card instead.
real_text:
Attach to your identity.
Forced Interrupt: When attached character would ready, discard this card instead.
illustrator: Frank D. Armata, Karl Kazel, & Jorge Molina

name: Macrobots
text: Guard. Retaliate 1.
real_text: Guard. Retaliate 1.
boost_text: Give Kang a tough status card.
real_boost_text: Give Kang a tough status card.

name: Weakened
text:
Forced Respoonse: After you use a basic hero power, take 1 damage.
Alter-Ego Action: Discard a [physical] resource from your hand → discard this obligation.
real_text:
Forced Respoonse: After you use a basic hero power, take 1 damage.
Alter-Ego Action: Discard a [physical] resource from your hand → discard this obligation.
flavor: "History is made! Made by the deeds of the strong! The brave! And destiny is forged!" - Kang
illustrator: Alvin Lee, Terry Pallot, & Val Staples

name: Stolen Memories
text:
When Revealed: Place the top 8 cards of your deck facedown under this card.
Alter-Ego Action: Discard a [mental] resource from your hand → discard this obligation. (Discard each facedown card under this obligation.)
real_text:
When Revealed: Place the top 8 cards of your deck facedown under this card.

name: Depowered
text:
You cannot play hero-specific cards.
Alter-Ego Action: Discard a hero-specific card from your hand → discard this obligation.
real_text:
You cannot play hero-specific cards.

flavor: "Greater men than you have trembled at my name. Lesser men have fainted at its mention!" - Kang
illustrator: Jim Cheung, John Dell, & Justin Pansor

name: Time-Travel Hijinks
text:
When Revealed: Discard the highest-cost card you control, then place it facedown under this card.
Alter-Ego Action: Discard a [energy] resource from your hand → discard this obligation.(Discard each facedown card under this obligation.)
real_text:

name: Corrupted Timestream
text:
Players cannot trigger "Alter-Ego Action" abilities on obligations.
When Revealed: Each player must either discard 1 random card from hand, or place 2 threat here.
real_text:
Players cannot trigger "Alter-Ego Action" abilities on obligations.

real_text:

text: When Revealed: Place 2 threat here for each obligation in play.
real_text: When Revealed: Place 2 threat here for each obligation in play.

name: Rampage
text: When Defeated: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the player who defeated this scheme.
real_text: When Defeated: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the player who defeated this scheme.

name: Energy Blast

When Revealed (Hero): Kang attacks you.
real_text:

text: When Revealed: Discard each event from your hand. If no events are discarded this way, this card gains surge.
